content: be loving by melissa simpson supplies gauge 5 spi 2-4 oz of worsted weight yarn fit slight negative ease tight fitting beanie darning needle sizing 14 16 18 20 22 24 inches nb through adult us 6 16 inch needles us 8 16 inch needles 1 stitch marker pattern cast on using smaller needles 68 76 88 96 108 116 stitches place marker and join in the round and knit in 2x2 ribbing for 2 2 25 2 5 2 75 3 3 5 inches switch to larger needles and knit for 3 3 5 4 4 5 5 5 in stockinet stitch begin crown shaping don t worry about extra stitches at the end of the round just add them in when the decreases allow row 1 *knit 7 k2tog* repeat till end of round row 2 and all even row knit row 3 *knit 6 k2tog* repeat till end of the round row 5 *knit 5 k2tog* repeat till end of the round row 7 *knit 4 k2tog* repeat till end of the round row 9 *knit 3 k2tog* repeat till end of the round row 11 *knit 2 k2tog* repeat till end of the round row 13 *knit 1 k2tog* repeat till end of the round row 15 * k2tog* repeat till end of the round cut yarn leaving a 8 inch tail and weave it through the remaining stitches on the needle and pull tight weave in ends hat can be worn with the ribbing folded up or down to cover the ears
